operation.name: takeSnapshot
operation.description: Takes a snapshot of all keyspaces. A snapshot first flushes all in-memory writes to disk and then creates a hard link of each SSTable file for the keyspace. Note that a column family can have multiple SSTables on disk. By default snapshots are stored in the <cassandra_data_dir>/<keyspace_name>/<column_family_name>/snapshots directory. On Linux/UNIX systems cassandra_data_dir defaults to /var/lib/cassandra/data

c:simple-property.name: snapshotName
c:simple-property.description: Snapshot name. If left empty current system time in milliseconds will be used as the snapshot name.

c:simple-property.name: retentionStrategy
c:simple-property.description: Retention Strategy defines what happens to snapshots after being created. Default is Keep All - nothing is cleaned up, Deletion Strategy is ignored. Keep Last N - newest N snaphosts remain, the rest of snapshots is cleaned up based on Deletion Strategy, N has to be specified using 'count' property. Delete Older Than N days - delete snapshots older than N days, rest of snapshots is cleaned up based on Deletion Strategy, N has to be specified using 'count' property

c:simple-property.name: count
c:simple-property.description: Additional parameter to Retention Strategy, stands for N

c:simple-property.name: deletionStrategy
c:simple-property.description: Deletion Strategy defines what happens to snapshots that don't match Retention Strategy. Default is Delete - snapshots will be deleted. Move - snapshots are moved to location specified by 'location' property.

c:simple-property.name: location
c:simple-property.description: Additional parameter to Deletion Strategy, specifies location to move snaphosts to.

operation.name: updateConfiguration
operation.description: Updates the node configuration. Will require a separate server restart for the settings to take effect.

c:simple-property.name: jmxPort
c:simple-property.description: JMX port JVM option.

c:simple-property.name: heapSize
c:simple-property.description: The heap size to be used for both -Xms and -Xmx JVM options.

c:simple-property.name: heapNewSize
c:simple-property.description: The heap new size to be used be used with -Xmn JVM option.

c:simple-property.name: threadStackSize
c:simple-property.description: The thread stack size. This memory is allocated to each thread off heap. The value should be an integer that will be interpreted in kilobytes.

c:simple-property.name: restartIfRequired
c:simple-property.description: If [true] then restart the server at the end of the update if and if only the updates made require a restart. If [false] the server will not be restarted regardless of the updates made.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: Outcome of updating the configuration.

c:simple-property.name: minHeapSize
c:simple-property.description: The minimum heap size. This value will be used with the -Xms JVM option. This is read only because it is automatically set to the same value as Max Heap Size.

c:simple-property.name: maxHeapSize
c:simple-property.description: The maximum heap size. This value will be used with the -Xmx JVM option. The value should be an integer with a suffix of M or G to indicate megabytes or gigabytes.

c:simple-property.name: heapNewSize
c:simple-property.description: The size of the new generation portion of the heap. This value will be used with the -Xmn JVM option. The value should be an integer with a suffix of M or G to indicate megabytes or gigabytes.

c:simple-property.name: threadStackSize
c:simple-property.description: The thread stack size. This memory is allocated to each thread off heap. The value should be an integer that will be interpreted in kilobytes.

c:simple-property.name: heapDumpOnOOMError
c:simple-property.description: Generate a heap dump when an OutOfMemoryError occurs

c:simple-property.name: heapDumpDir
c:simple-property.description: The directory in which heap dumps will be written.

c:simple-property.name: cqlPort
c:simple-property.description: The port on which to listen for client requests over the native, CQL protocol. This is a shared, cluster-wide setting.

c:simple-property.name: gossipPort
c:simple-property.description: The port used for internode communication. This is a shared, cluster-wide setting.

c:simple-property.name: CommitLogLocation
c:simple-property.description: Location of the commit log directory

c:simple-property.name: SavedCachesLocation
c:simple-property.description: Location of the saved caches directory
